blueprint.description: Installs youtube-dl, a command-line program to download videos from YouTube and other sites, on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [youtube-dl](https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl) is an open-source download manager for video and audio from YouTube and over 1000 other video hosting websites. It is released under the Unlicense software license and is one of the most popular projects on GitHub.
blueprint.name: youtube-dl
blueprint.title: youtube-dl
